alert.note: Alert for Bibb; Greene; Hale; Perry; Pickens; Sumter; Tuscaloosa (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 6:39PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Tuscaloosa, southern Pickens, northern Perry, Greene, Hale, Bibb and northwestern Sumter Counties through 730 PM CDT... At 639 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Aliceville to near North Bibb. Movement was south at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tuscaloosa, Northport, Brent, Eutaw, Centreville, Greensboro, Aliceville, Carrollton, Pickensville, Holt, Moundville, Lake View, Brookwood, Coaling, Vance, Woodstock, West Blocton, Coker, Akron and Boligee. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for central and west central Alabama.

area.areaDesc: Bibb; Greene; Hale; Perry; Pickens; Sumter; Tuscaloosa
